join: Joins the channel you are in or the one you give the id to
leave: Leaves the channel I am currently in
pause: Pauses or resume the song depending on if it is already paused or not
stop: Stops the playing of current song
download: Downloads the song from youtube, needs a link
find: Finds songs matching the keyword from the downloaded songs, needs a keyword
play: Plays the song matching the keyword, needs a keyword
